Microsoft Hololens

Microsoft is the current leader in Augmented Reality with HoloLens, which is the first self-contained holographic computer. The current headset is geared towards developers and business applications with no current plans to release a consumer grade product. Version 2 is scheduled to be released in 2019 which will be lighter, fit better and come at a reduced price to spur adoption.

Microsoft HoloLens
